page.title: 03Ad Astra School Survey.
page.content: We interviewed some children at Ad Astra First School to find out their likes and dislikes of their school.All the people we asked liked school.They all thought they should wear school uniform and nothing else.They liked their uniform.When asked should their teachers wear school colours all but 5 agreed.They all liked their lessons and their teachers.Out of the 38 asked 17 liked Maths best,3 liked Art/Craft best,13 liked English best and 5 liked P.E best.When asked what was their least favourite lesson 12 said Maths, 14 said English,4 said Games and 8 didn't mind.When asked would they like to leave the school all but 2 said NO because they like their school very much.They have 2 lessons a day and they start school at 8:45 and finish at 3:15 for the lower school (4-6) and 3:3O for the upper school (6-8).
